segments.text: What's the matter with you , then ? You look miserable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean by us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we used to talk to each other before we were married.Remember ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean ? We're talking now , aren't we ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , but we used to do so much together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I remember.But we never used to argue.You used to think I was wonderful.Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Back to live with my parents.That ' s something else I used to do before we were married.Remember ?
segments.speaker: S2
